channel.title: CVE Feed for wppuzzle -- Comment Images Reloaded
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wppuzzle -- Comment Images Reloaded

item.title: CVE-2024-5856|2024-08-01T21:25:02.945Z -- wppuzzle -- comment%20images%20reloaded
item.description: The Comment Images Reloaded plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the cir_delete_image AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary media attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-5856|2024-07-09T08:33:06.273Z -- wppuzzle -- comment%20images%20reloaded
